overview.en: EBCoin (EBC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. EBCoin has a current supply of 10,295,055,165.813244 with 4,585,368,085.833244 in circulation. The last known price of EBCoin is 0.0002177 USD and is down -0.18 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $28.18 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://ebcoin.io.
